verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
That's all right. (Repeat 4x.)
For I know that I have a seat in the Kingdom,
And that's all right; that's all right.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sometimes I wonder why
Good things, they seem to pass me by.
But, I know I've got a seat in the Kingdom;
That's all right; that's all right.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
It gets sweeter as the days go by,
And that's all right; that's all right, etc.
